languages.text: "Феноменально... и сколько же, по твоему, веков будет затухать и остывать этот огненный шар, чтобы на его поверхность можно было спустить геологические отряды? Если, конечно, он вообще будет остывать — это происходит далеко не всегда".

traits.locale_text: "Феноменально... и сколько же, по твоему, веков будет затухать и остывать этот огненный шар, чтобы на его поверхность можно было спустить геологические отряды? Если, конечно, он вообще будет остывать — это происходит далеко не всегда".

languages.text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."
languages.original_text: "Феноменально... и сколько же, по твоему, веков будет затухать и остывать этот огненный шар, чтобы на его поверхность можно было спустить геологические отряды? Если, конечно, он вообще будет остывать — это происходит далеко не всегда".

traits.locale_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

"Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

"Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

"Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

"Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

languages.text: “这也太夸张了……你觉得，这些岩浆要过多少个世纪才能冷却，我们要等多久才能派人过去？或者说，万一岩浆根本不会冷却，该怎么办？没人能保证岩浆真的会冷却。”
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: “这也太夸张了……你觉得，这些岩浆要过多少个世纪才能冷却，我们要等多久才能派人过去？或者说，万一岩浆根本不会冷却，该怎么办？没人能保证岩浆真的会冷却。”

languages.text: «Espléndido... ¿Y cuántos siglos crees que harían falta para que la bola de fuego se enfriara y pudiéramos enviar gente a la superficie? Suponiendo que fuera a enfriarse en primer lugar, porque tampoco tenemos garantías».
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: «Espléndido... ¿Y cuántos siglos crees que harían falta para que la bola de fuego se enfriara y pudiéramos enviar gente a la superficie? Suponiendo que fuera a enfriarse en primer lugar, porque tampoco tenemos garantías».

languages.text: 「なんと素敵でしょう…だが、この火の玉が冷えて人々を地上に送り出せるようになるまでに何世紀かかると思うか？そもそも冷えるという保証もまったくないのだ」
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: 「驚異的です…そして、この火の玉が冷えて人々を地上に送り出せるようになるまでに何世紀かかると思いますか？たとえ冷えたとしても…それが起こるという保証はまったくないのです」
「なんと素敵でしょう…だが、この火の玉が冷えて人々を地上に送り出せるようになるまでに何世紀かかると思うか？そもそも冷えるという保証もまったくないのだ」

languages.text: « Formidable... Et d'après vous, combien de siècles seront nécessaires avant que cette boule de feu ne refroidisse et que nous puissions envoyer des gens à la surface ? Si elle refroidit un jour, ce qui n'est absolument pas garanti. »
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: « Formidable... Et d'après vous, combien de siècles seront nécessaires avant que cette boule de feu ne refroidisse et que nous puissions envoyer des gens à la surface ? Si elle refroidit un jour, ce qui n'est absolument pas garanti. »

languages.text: "Phänomenal ... Und wie viele Jahrhunderte würde es wohl dauern, bevor dieser Feuerball abgekühlt wäre und wir Leute zur Oberfläche hinunterschicken könnten? Falls er sich überhaupt abkühlt – es gibt keine Garantie dafür."
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: "Phänomenal ... Und wie viele Jahrhunderte würde es wohl dauern, bevor dieser Feuerball abgekühlt wäre und wir Leute zur Oberfläche hinunterschicken könnten? Falls er sich überhaupt abkühlt – es gibt keine Garantie dafür."

languages.text: "Harikulade. Peki bu ateş topunun soğuyarak adamlarımızı yüzeyine indirebileceğimiz hâle gelmesi için kaç asır geçmesi gerekir sence? Tabii soğursa. Öyle bir şeyin garantisi de yok."
languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."

traits.locale_text: "Harikulade. Peki bu ateş topunun soğuyarak adamlarımızı yüzeyine indirebileceğimiz hâle gelmesi için kaç asır geçmesi gerekir sence? Tabii soğursa. Öyle bir şeyin garantisi de yok."

languages.original_text: "Phenomenal... And how many centuries do you suppose would pass before this ball of fire cooled and we could start sending people to the surface? If it even would cool — there is no guarantee that it would happen at all."
